Name: Verify Product Sorting Functionality by Price (ex: Price: Low to High)
Precondition: * The user must be logged in to the application.
Expected Result:
* The products should be sorted in (ex: ascending order based on their
      price).
    * The product with (ex: the lowest price) should appear at the top,
      followed by (ex: higher-priced) products.
Test Data: * Sort Option: (ex: Price Low to High)
Test Steps:
* Navigate to<https://www.saucedemo.com/> .
    * Log in using valid credentials.
    * On the homepage, click on the sort dropdown menu.
    * Select the option (ex: Price low to high) from the dropdown.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The SauceDemo login page is displayed, showing fields for username and 
password.

The user successfully logs in and is redirected to the product homepage, 
displaying a list of available products.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: * On the homepage, click on the sort dropdown menu.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Test Data: * Sort Option: (ex: Price Low to High)
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The sort dropdown menu is displayed, showing various sorting options (e.g., 
Name (A to Z), Name (Z to A), Price (low to high), Price (high to low)).

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: * Select the option (ex: Price low to high) from the dropdown.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
* The product list is rearranged to display items sorted by (ex: price
      in ascending order).
    * The product images, names, and prices should correctly reflect the
      new sorting order.

Name: Verify Product Display on Homepage
Precondition:
* The user must have access to the internet.
    * The user must have valid credentials to log in.
Expected Result:
All products are displayed on the homepage with the following details:
    * Name: Each product has a visible name.
    * Image: Each product displays a corresponding image.
    * Description: Each product has a description.
    * Price: Each product displays the correct price.
Test Steps:
* Navigate to<https://www.saucedemo.com/> .
    * Log in using valid credentials 
    * Observe the homepage where products are displayed.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The SauceDemo login page is displayed, showing fields for username and 
password.

The user is successfully logged in and redirected to the product homepage, 
where a list of available products is displayed

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: * Observe the homepage where products are displayed.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The homepage displays various products, including the Sauce Labs Backpack. 
If the Sauce Labs Backpack is out of stock, it should be labeled clearly 
(e.g., "Out of Stock") with a disabled "Add to Cart" button. All other 
available products should be visible and ready for purchase.

Name: Verify Product Display on Product Page
Precondition:
* The user must have access to the internet.
    * The user must have valid credentials to log in.
Expected Result:
* User is redirected to the product details page.
    * The details page displays:
          o Name: Each product has a visible name.
          o Image: Each product displays a corresponding image.
          o Description: Each product has a description.
          o Price: Each product displays the correct price.
          o Add to Cart button: Visible on the page.
Test Data:
* Username: standard_user
    * Password: secret_sauce
    * Product Name: Sauce Labs Backpack
Test Steps:
* Navigate to<https://www.saucedemo.com/> .
    * Log in using valid credentials 
    * Locate a product on the homepage (e.g., Sauce Labs Backpack).
    * Click on the product image or name.
    * Observe the Product Page where the product is displayed.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The SauceDemo login page is displayed, showing fields for username and 
password.

The user is successfully logged in and redirected to the product homepage, 
where a list of available products is displayed

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: * Locate a product on the homepage (e.g., Sauce Labs Backpack).
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The "Sauce Labs Backpack" product is visible on the homepage with its 
image, name, and price.

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: * Click on the product image or name.
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
The user is redirected to the product details page, where the product 
image, description, add to cart button and price are displayed accurately, 
matching the product from the homepage.
